text: Simone Pacini (born 8 January 1981) is a Sammarinese footballer who plays for local club Folgore, as a Midfielder. He won the Campionato Sammarinese di Calcio and Coppa Titano during the 2014–15 season. ==Career== Born in San Marino, Pacini has represented one club on a permanent basis: Folgore. He made his debut for the club on 22 January 2012 against S.C. Faetano. During the 2014–15 season he won the Campionato Sammarinese di Calcio and Coppa Titano with the club.San Marino - S.
